subproject.description:
1. A survey leading to a package fo policy recommendations and an Action Plan to promote women's advancement and leadership in the public sector.
2. Postgraduate study as the University of Cambridge and short term training courses for women in the public sector.
3. Practical policy research in conjunction with Cambridge scholars and/or aligned with project themes and objectives.
4. Presentation of research results at international conferences and annual conferences in Viet Nam.
5. Formation of an alumni association/ women's leadership network 
6. Project Management and support
subproject.gender code: Gender Equality as a principal objective
subproject.title: Women Empowerment
